original_text: Then Jehoshaphat bent down with his face towards the ground. All the people of Judah and the people who lived in Jerusalem also bent down to worship the Lord.
korean_text: 여호사밧이 몸을 굽혀 얼굴을 땅에 대니 온 유다와 예루살렘 주민들도 여호와 앞에 엎드려 여호와께 경배하고

sentences.original_text: with his face towards the ground
and the people who lived in Jerusalem
also bent down to worship the Lord
